content.question: Which of the following statements about females with primary school education in 1986 and 2016 is true?

choices.label: In China, less than 45 percent of females had a primary school education in 2016.
In Russia, more than 49 percent of females had a primary school education in 2016.
In Nigeria, 48 percent of females had a primary school education in 1986.
In Iran, more than 49 percent of females had a primary school education in 1986.

content.answer: In Russia, more than 49 percent of females had a primary school education in 2016.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
